action.action-desc: Mr. Fitzpatrick (for himself, Mr. Evans, Ms. Stefanik, Ms. Lee of Nevada, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, and Mr. Gottheimer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To ensure that a fair percentage of Federal cancer research funds are dedicated to pediatric cancer research.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fairness to Kids with Cancer Act of 2023.

section.header: Percentage of Federal cancer research funds required To be used for pediatric cancer research

subsection.text: For fiscal year 2024 and each subsequent fiscal year, the President shall ensure that, of the total amount of Federal funds obligated for cancer research, the percentage obligated for pediatric cancer research is equal to the percentage described in subsection (b).

The percentage described in this subsection is the percentage constituted by the ratio of the number of individuals who are under the age of 18 residing in the United States at the end of the fiscal year preceding the fiscal year to which subsection (a) is being applied, to the total number of individuals residing in the United States at such time, as determined by the Bureau of the Census.
